languages.text: Машина искрится, и Мастер вокса исступленно запрокидывает голову. Кровь расчерчивает линии по лицу и имплантам, а тело содрогается от электрических импульсов. Офицер-пустотнорожденный выхватывает кортик, отрубает подсоединенные кабели и подхватывает обмякшее тело Мастера вокса.

traits.locale_text: Машина искрится, и Мастер Вокса исступленно запрокидывает голову. Кровь расчерчивает линии по лицу и имплантам Мастера Вокса, а тело содрогается от электрических импульсов. Офицер-пустотник выхватывает кортик, отрубает подсоединенные кабели и подхватывает обмякшее тело Мастера Вокса.

languages.text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.
languages.original_text: Машина искрится, и Мастер вокса исступленно запрокидывает голову. Кровь расчерчивает линии по лицу и имплантам, а тело содрогается от электрических импульсов. Офицер-пустотнорожденный выхватывает кортик, отрубает подсоединенные кабели и подхватывает обмякшее тело Мастера вокса.

traits.locale_text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood crisscrosses her face and implants, and her body is shuddering from the electric impulses. The voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and swoops up the Vox Master's limp body.

The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.

languages.text: La máquina chisporrotea y la maestra de vocos echa atrás la cabeza, frenética. La sangre cruza su cara e implantes y su cuerpo se estremece por las descargas eléctricas. Un oficial nacido en el vacío saca una daga, corta los cables conectados a la estación y recoge en brazos el cuerpo de la maestra de vocos.
languages.original_text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.

traits.locale_text: La máquina chisporrotea y la maestra de vocos echa atrás la cabeza, frenética. La sangre cruza su cara e implantes y su cuerpo se estremece por las descargas eléctricas. Un oficial nacido en el vacío saca una daga, corta los cables conectados a la estación y recoge en brazos el cuerpo de la maestra de vocos.

languages.text: 火花从机械中迸发出来，音阵大师向后甩着头，仿佛发狂一般。她的脸上与植入物开始充血，身体也由于电脉冲而颤抖不止。一名虚空之子军官掏出匕首，切断了她连接到音阵站的电缆，将瘫软的音阵大师抱在怀里。
languages.original_text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.

traits.locale_text: 火花从机械中迸发出来，音阵大师向后甩着头，仿佛发狂一般。她的脸上与植入物开始充血，身体也由于电脉冲而颤抖不止。一名虚空之子军官掏出匕首，切断了她连接到音阵站的电缆，将瘫软的音阵大师抱在怀里。

languages.text: 機械が火花を散らし、ヴォクスマスターは狂ったように頭を後ろに投げ出す。血がその顔とインプラントに飛び散って、体が電気の衝撃で震えた。虚空生まれの士官が短剣を引き抜いてステーションに接続されているケーブルを切断し、ヴォクス・マスターのぐったりとした体を腕の中に抱き抱えた。
languages.original_text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.

traits.locale_text: 機械が火花を散らし、ヴォクスマスターは狂ったように頭を後ろに投げ出す。血がその顔とインプラントに飛び散って、体が電気の衝撃で震えた。虚空生まれの士官が短剣を引き抜いてステーションに接続されているケーブルを切断し、ヴォクス・マスターのぐったりとした体を腕の中に抱き抱えた。

languages.text: Die Maschine sprüht Funken, und die Voxmeisterin wirft ihren Kopf wild zurück. Blut durchzieht ihr Gesicht und ihre Implantate. Ihr Körper zittert von den elektrischen Impulsen. Ein leerengeborener Offizier zieht einen Dolch, durchtrennt die Kabel der Station und nimmt den schlaffen Körper der Voxmeisterin in seine Arme.
languages.original_text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.

languages.text: Soudain, Vigdis rejette sa tête en arrière alors que des étincelles jaillissent de la machine. Du sang éclabousse son visage et ses implants, et les impulsions électriques font tressauter son corps. Un officier hors-monde sort une dague, tranche les câbles reliés au poste et attrape le corps inconscient de la maîtresse-vox dans ses bras.
languages.original_text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.

traits.locale_text: Soudain, Vigdis rejette sa tête en arrière alors que des étincelles jaillissent de la machine. Du sang éclabousse son visage et ses implants, et les impulsions électriques font tressauter son corps. Un officier hors-monde sort une dague, tranche les câbles reliés au poste et attrape le corps inconscient de la maîtresse-vox dans ses bras.

languages.text: Makine kıvılcımlar saçıyor. Voks Üstadı başını çılgınca geriye atıyor. Yüzü ile implantlarından kan fışkırıyor, vücudu ise elektrik darbeleriyle titriyor. Uçsuzdoğan bir subay, bir hançer çıkarıp istasyona bağlı kabloları kesiyor ve Voks Üstadı'nın güçsüz vücudunu kollarına alıyor.
languages.original_text: The machine sparks, and the Vox Master throws her head back frenziedly. Blood criss-crosses her face and implants, and her body shudders from the electric impulses. A voidborn officer pulls out a dagger, cuts the cables connected to the station, and sweeps the Vox Master's limp body into his arms.

traits.locale_text: Makine kıvılcımlar saçıyor. Voks Üstadı başını çılgınca geriye atıyor. Yüzü ile implantlarından kan fışkırıyor, vücudu ise elektrik darbeleriyle titriyor. Uçsuzdoğan bir subay, bir hançer çıkarıp istasyona bağlı kabloları kesiyor ve Voks Üstadı'nın güçsüz vücudunu kollarına alıyor.
